title: Equation/Substitute
text: The equation for calculuating the rate of change is $$\frac{f{\left(x_1\right)}-f{\left(x_2\right)}}{x_1-x_2}$$. So to find the answer, we can start by plugging in $$5$$ for $$x_1$$ and $$1$$ for $$x_2$$, and we get the expression $$\frac{5^2-1^2}{5-1}$$.

title: Calculate
text: Evaluate the expression $$\frac{5^2-1^2}{5-1}$$. What do you get?
